title: Buying a Product
setting: Describe your latest shopping experience. What did you buy? How was your interaction with the staff? How did you make your choice?

title: Introducing Yourself
setting: Write a brief introduction about yourself. Where are you from? What are your hobbies? What do you do for a living?

title: A Memorable Birthday
setting: Write about a birthday celebration that left a lasting impression. Who was there? What special activities took place? How did you feel during the event?

title: Planning a Trip
setting: Describe how you plan a vacation or a weekend getaway. Where would you like to go and why? How do you prepare and pack for the journey?

title: My Favorite Food
setting: Talk about your favorite food. What is it, and how is it made or served? Why do you enjoy it so much, and do you have any special memories associated with it?

title: A Day at the Park
setting: Write about a relaxing day spent in a park. Describe the scenery, the activities you engaged in, and any interesting encounters you had.
topic: Describe a day at the park

title: My Daily Routine
setting: Provide a detailed account of your daily routine. What do you do from morning to evening? How does your routine help you manage your day?
